description: The Signature T-Shirt is made from a premium 100 % organic cotton jersey and offers a soft and comfortable feel. Simple and classic with the Hooké printed logo, it has a regular fit that provides a relaxed and flattering look that is true to size. You can feel confident in its sustainable and high-quality construction thanks to the GOTS and Oeko-Tex® standard 100 certifications.
name: Hooke Signature T-Shirt - Mens
